website_summaries.verdict: Enjoy a steady stream of sugar from an easy to pour, classic 12-oz. shaker.
pros: This glass shaker is eco-friendly and also kitchen friendly
It can be used efficiently in the microwave as the material is non-corrosive
cons: It's suggested that this dispenser facilitates fine sugar better than others

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dispenser not for sugar but for half-and-half for my coffee. I like that it dispenses very gradually, I like that it seals tight when it's closed, I like the size and shape, and I like that it's hefty and it's glass. I don't like ... wait, what's not to like? Not a thing. It's just right for my purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Thick glass. I accidentally dropped it and no damage was done, the lid stayed on too. Makes pouring it way easier. Leaks a little from the spout, but other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Product Princess

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sugar dry
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The top pops easily open and shut to keep the sugar inside dry. There is also a little rubber gasket inside for extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: DubbyF

customer_reviews.title: Clogs Up After A While
customer_reviews.text: I use it for pouring sugar. Unfortunately, the hole collects sugar and plugs up after several weeks of daily use. At least the lid will come off for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: A little small but works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Im a single dude who only really needs this for my coffee in the morning so I have to refill this about once every 2 weeks if that helps give you an idea the size. This is a little smaller than I was expecting but fits my needs perfectly! The only issue I have ran into is sugar building up from the opening, it is expected as it is sugar, but incredibly easy to clean out. Just rinse in hot water for 10 seconds and its brand new. Either way, I really like this dispenser and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds sugar
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. We were storing our sugar in a large ugly orange classic Tupperware container so it was fairly bulky/unattractive to pull out. This is much handier. I've had this for several months now and found that as it gets close to empty, the sugar gets stuck in the spout a bit. Give it a shake and its just fine, but it performs perfectly when full.
customer_reviews.author: tlawson

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be "just right". Not too big, so it's hard to handle... not too small, so that you have to refill it all the time. The style and color goes with all my different patterns of dishes - so it's rather universal / blends in with whatever I am setting the table with. Lid shuts firmly, so sugar stays fresh. Easy to open and pour. Pretty darned good for what it is and what it cost. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Gal

customer_reviews.title: Works for Flavored Coffee Creamer
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a powdered coffee creamer dispenser for awhile before I took a chance on this one. I don't like the busy labels of the store containers on my counter so this helped me class up the joint a bit. It does work for Coffee-Mate flavored powder creamer rather well. (The original, non-flavored variety seems to be thicker, so would probably still pour, but might require some beating/shaking.) When I close the lid, I get a little puff of creamer that I've stopped wiping off of the brim because it blends in anyways and it's not that serious. Not much else to say, I'm just glad I finally found something that does what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it serves its purpose. My struggle is the hole isn't very large so sugar gets caught quickly and I have to continuously re-adjust or move the sugar out of the way to continue pouring. It just clogs up. And I use it for my coffee,so its not like im using a large amount at a time. Other than that, it works well and is appropriate size
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Poor design - challenge with sugar dispensing
customer_reviews.text: The sugar sticks to tiny opening where it pours out, making it nearly impossible to get any sugar to pour out into our hot beverages. Now I have to buy another sugar dispenser. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ants
customer_reviews.text: I used the dispenser for five days. I don't drink coffee on the weekends, and only dispensed sugar on Thursday and Friday. I made sure that the lid was completely closed after both uses. I just discovered ants in the dispenser and lid. Would not recommend this product unless you want ants in your sugar/kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sugar Jar
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar jar. Bought it for the office. It doesn’t get nasty and is easy to refill. So I’m not worried about how many people handle it. Because nothing can get inside. Easy push to open. Heavy. Over all it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: C T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just got my dispenser and really love it. I put dehydrated cane juice/sugar in mine and it works great. It dose pour out easy and I just tilt it back to get any lose sugar away from the lid when I’m ready to close it. I don’t think it would be liquid tight but it works great for our coffee sugar type use.
customer_reviews.author: BELLA MIA

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and is easy enough to fill and clean, however the plastic dispenser piece is not very high-quality and is continually getting stuck, I have made sure to clean the thing and that is not the issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sugar clumps clogs opening
customer_reviews.text: When pouring over hot beverage, the sugar clumps in the opening and doesn't pour. Sugar also get stuck in the lid crevice and pours out when tilted.
customer_reviews.author: oddwee

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This sucks, we're sending it back. The top doesn't close well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sugar + Coffee = Fail
customer_reviews.text: Horrible for sugar! Moisture gets in the lid while pouring into cofee causing the sugar to get lumpy and unable to pour! Would not recommend if you plan on buying for sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: After going through a couple of choices with poor results, This seems to be the best option for those just wanting to keep their area granular free. It arrived in perfect shape and works without fail. Very simple design and hefty enough to endure the shipping process without dents or dings. If you want a nice looking and simple choice this would be the one.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Coukd have bwwn great but the lid doesnt close all the way and some sugar leaks out. This leak fills with sugar and plugs up the path for the lid causing it to stick shut. Then all you can do is take it apart. Maybe it would be good for extra coarse sugar? Why?
customer_reviews.author: I am a GeekTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and refill
customer_reviews.text: I do like this sugar dispenser's clean look, and the wide mouth makes filling easy. The "one hand" snap/push cap makes pouring easy. I did deduct one star due to the somewhat small pour opening. Given sugars propensity to develop clumps you have to make sure that the sugar is "clump free" when you fill it otherwise small clumps will stop up the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Donna OBrien

customer_reviews.title: No seal, so don't shake contents
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold a dry mixture of sugar and cocoa powder. Well, there's no seal, so if you make the mistake of shaking it, you'll have a bit of a mess on your hands. :) I'm going to probably replace this with the Oxo sugar dispenser, which we also have, and it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was an OXO
customer_reviews.text: If there is even one clump of sugar it will not pour out. I live in FL so this is not for me. I gave it to Goodwill
customer_reviews.author: Lari T

customer_reviews.title: Decent dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This sugar dispenser works great and seems like it should last a long time. My only complaint is that it's a little on the small side. In all fairness the size is typical for sugar dispensers. I would suggest a 24oz size for home-use sugar dispensers so you wouldn't need to refill the thing every time you turn around. If the size doesn't bother you I would highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ok. . ..
customer_reviews.text: Bought the dispenser to avoid sugar getting all over the counter unfortunately sugar sticks to the opening of the lid so you have to dust off the excess sugar on the lis to close it correctly which leads to sugar on my countertop. It doesn't hold as much as I thought it would either
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Sugar dispenser good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Good Cook Glass Sugar Dispenser, 12 oz and I am very pleased with the product. We use it daily. Sugar pours out well for tea and such. I like that the top can be kept closed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great size and value-but doesn't seal 100%
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a good price. I'm pleased with everything except that the lid doesn't seal 100% and I sometimes spill sugar when handling this. I also wish that this had an option with a small screen to prevent clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: its ok. but find something else instead.
customer_reviews.text: it does what i need but the top gets sugar crusted in in easily and if you shake it to break up the clumped sugar inside then sugar starts flying out the opening a little bit because it doesn't close all the way. regret buying this one. saw a better one at the dollar store a week later and i wish i had seen it before i bought this.
customer_reviews.author: sycx1

customer_reviews.title: Dribbles out, does not pour
customer_reviews.text: I used this for half/half cream. The top dribbles out, it does not pours. To clean, its best to do it in the the dishwasher or buy a bottle brush. You have to take the round part out on the top or it won't come clean and putting it back on is not so easy because you can't see the notches to line up. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  sugar dispenser. Keeps out humidity & sugar ants
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for sugar. Love the looks. Looks nice on my counter. Dispenses sugar slowly so you don't overdo it. Have found that if I dispense sugar into a dry cup before I add steamy hot liquid, the mouth doesn't clog like I've read in previous reviews. Stays clean. Would recommend this for sugar.
customer_reviews.author: B. J.

customer_reviews.title: Boring but works well
customer_reviews.text: Very ordinary in design but works well. Wish it came in other colors. If you just want something that works and don’t care what it looks like, this is for you. Works well, just has a 50’s design (nada). Kitchen things don’t have to be boring, do they?
customer_reviews.author: Grammy in Lees Summit

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Sugar
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is so much better than the glass jar with the screw on metal lid with the flap. Living in FL I had to keep it in a sealed jar to keep out moisture and bugs. The Good Cook Glass Sugar Dispenser closes with a snap. Easy. Sits on the counter now.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Lamb

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my powdered creamer. I love it. I just wish it was a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cap can get sticky
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick glass to hold the sugar in, but the top can get sticky. If you use it frequently the sugar can get stick in the caps open/close function and make it hard to do both. It’s kind of annoying but it can be cleaned to help
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Day

customer_reviews.title: Best Dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Should've bought one long ago. Works great! I have been saving money by making my own cofee. So this was needed. Looks just like the ones you would see at a resturant.
customer_reviews.author: A-DuBB

customer_reviews.title: Just so, so.
customer_reviews.text: Lid is not air tight. Not easy to fill. Somewhat smaller than expected and pours too freely. REALLY wish I'd bit the bullet and coughed up the extra $$$ for the OXO brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy for people that have problems with hands.  Young and old!!
customer_reviews.text: Handy, slow pouring, I enjoy even having to shake a few times to get sugar to pour
customer_reviews.author: Moonface

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Most sugar dispensers are not air tight, but this glass sugar dispenser comes very close! We use Sugar in the Raw turbinado cane sugar, which is thicker than extra fine granulated sugar, without any problem. I recommend this type sugar dispenser vs. other sugar dispensers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Holds as much as the glass dispensers with the metal top, but is much easier to open when it's time for a refill.
customer_reviews.author: James Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Jar not so good
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of uses it is not easy to dispense or use. The sugar does not come out and it not easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Add sugar to coffee cup first!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sugar bowl. The only thing I don't like about it is when you put sugar in a hot cup of coffee, the steam causes the sugar to stick in a bunch at the opening. So IF I remember to I'll add the sugar first, then the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Tlynn

customer_reviews.title: Sugar!
customer_reviews.text: When hubby broke my beautiful sugar bowl that matched the china I realized we didn't need to replace that. So we got this. If it breaks, we are only out a few dollars. This is doing a great job for us.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sugar
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute! It blends in well with my other kitchen items. I drink coffee every day with some sugar, but I only have to refill it once every other month or so. It is so easy to clean, and the nozzle pops open easily but still closes tightly. I have not spilled any sugar in the months I have had this dispenser. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The small Rubber ring can easily be lost down the drain
customer_reviews.text: The steam from a hot beverage will harden the sugar. There are several little things I could mention so instead I'll just give it 2 stars & simply state It's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cane sugar crystals
customer_reviews.text: The opening is a bit small for larger sugar grains. Regular white bleach sugar should be fine, but I prefer the less-processed forms of sugar, and this model is not the best for them.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S. Grazio

customer_reviews.title: Attractive dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The sugar pours out at just the right speed and the lid snaps shuts to protect the contents. Very attractive and fits the hand nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: hated the traditional sugar dispensers as the little metal flap often refused to open, These not only look better but I like that you can open and close them with certainty. I have one for organic sugar and one for stevia, so everyone is happy
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dietz

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this dispenser closes fully making it easy to wipe clean, however, the opening doesn't allow for a full pour in my husbands opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I make sugar waffles for my son almost every morning, and this has been the perfect handy little gadget to hold the sugar so I get a more consistent coating.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Seay

customer_reviews.title: Sugar for your coffee, perfected
customer_reviews.text: Dispenses sugar like a pro! No problem with clump-prone raw sugar. Holds a good amount so you’re not filling it all the time. Could look cooler, but it fulfills its function flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: EagerEyes

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight or bug proof 😩
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would keep ants out, and be air tight but it isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This might not be an issue with this particular product but expect the sugar to stick to the glass and make dispensing and cleaning a bit not super easy. Gets the job done and is nicely built.
customer_reviews.author: Sarcar

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: This works fine but sugar tends to accumulate and stick at the pouring spout. It's also not air-tight, but we've not had issues with bugs getting into it.
customer_reviews.author: A reviewer in FL

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in our coffee nook. It works great! You can close it to keep sugar fresh and is easy to open and dispense!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Good opening size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and opens up enough for raw sugar to pour through.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pedraza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fine granule sugar dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought it for sugar in the raw. Does not work for the larger granules. Though it’s excellent for finer grain sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Zak Marcom

customer_reviews.title: Good container
customer_reviews.text: Perfect container for sugar. Made Well, Easy to pour spout, expression I living in a state with high humidity and bugs, this container will keep my sugar fresh and bug-free
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but too big for mr
customer_reviews.text: Good product except that it is too big for sugar or powder
customer_reviews.author: Haechan An

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pour sugar out.
customer_reviews.text: I use the dispenser for sugar. So much easier then getting it out of a large container every time.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill and dispense. Made of glass but it’s not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good dispenser but the sugar cakes up. So you have to clean very often.
customer_reviews.author: Smyrna Girl

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Use for sugar and I like that the top snaps shut so ants can’t get in. Also like the glass. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ4JC

customer_reviews.title: lid shuts good
customer_reviews.text: got this from amazon nice lid locks to keep moisture out my old one would cake up this is a good buy great packing and delivery from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This sugar dispenser is just great, really love it. The sugar flow is just right.
customer_reviews.author: larry ridl

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: It's working out really well. I had a restaurant style w/the metal lid and I fought every time to get the lid on and off.(Big Scream).
customer_reviews.author: Barb C.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it ! I don’t use sugar in my coffee, I bought it to replace broken metal topped type and to me it doesn’t let sugar come out fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Now, if I can only get others in my household to close it when finished!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Freisthler

customer_reviews.title: Works As Intended
customer_reviews.text: Great little sugar holder - very happy with the purchase thus far. Easy to use and easy to clean = 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Love this sugar dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Easy open and secure closure. Great quality & perfect size. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use clean and neat
customer_reviews.text: Great dispenser looks clean and neat. Easy to dispense. I use my for Splenda and it comes out pretty well. Bought one my sister saw it in my house and loved it ordered one for her as well
customer_reviews.author: Shopway

customer_reviews.title: Works Nicely
customer_reviews.text: This container dispenses sugar at a good rate. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marigold

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Gets Hard
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 days the sugar was hard and was building up on the spout. I don't have high hopes for the longevity of this sugar dispenser...on with the search for a good sugar dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: EJB

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had been missing not having a sugar dispenser for some time after my last one broke. This one is just the right size, has an easy open/close pour feature and easy to handle/use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Patton

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this sugar dispenser, but it is small and where it flips up gets clogged pretty fast, and the hole isn’t very big. I’m pretty disappointed, I really wanted to like it!
customer_reviews.author: suzyk61

customer_reviews.title: Good solid sugar dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Good sugar container. Make sure to close it when not in use or your sugar will clump up.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Adler

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality, basic sugar dispenser. Easy to use, clean, and refill.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Cressler

customer_reviews.title: Good for standard white sugar.
customer_reviews.text: Great little dispenser! Just not so great with organic cane sugar. It’s too thick to pour out at a reasonable rate.
customer_reviews.author: generationXgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this style better then the standard one because surgar would jam the lid so it wouldn't come off. That issue doesn't apply with this dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Harris

customer_reviews.title: It works.  It looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our home kitchen after our old one broke. It looks nice and works well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GumbyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser keeps the sugar from becoming a hard lump. Much nicer to look at than my old fashioned one. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JL Guelker

customer_reviews.title: Don't like
customer_reviews.text: Worst lid design ever comes off hard to put back on iam talking about the flip part of the lid terrible
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: I use for salt
customer_reviews.text: I keep it full of kosher salt near the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sugar Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Sugar Dispenser. Holds a large amount of sugar with ease of use. Looks great and a perfect addition for my morning coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've owned three different sugar dispensers and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: melissa holland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek look of this dispenser, I can keep it out on the counter without wanting to hide it in the cabinet. It is easy to open for arthritic hands. When it gets a little clump of sugar, I just shake it a bit the clump breaks up. Use it for hot tea, daily.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S. Skytta

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Is not air tight . Bought it to keep ants out.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald woolridge

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to use. A little smaller than expected but just means need to refill it more often.
customer_reviews.text: It was small but perfect for everyday use. The sugar cameout clumpless compared to the clumps our old sugar jar used to have.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to full and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to full and easy to use. Great alternative to other things we've been make shift using to pour sugar with!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Envy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sugar doesn't flow out as smoothly as if like. Will be shopping for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzn

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it was airtight but it wasn’t :(
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheap sugar dispenser from Walmart for 98 cents, thinking what could be difficult about dispensing sugar. The cheap one I bought had a lid that didn't line up with the threading of the glass, so the lid was never thouroughly on tight. The sugar clumped together at the bottom, which may have been because of the loose lid letting in moisture. But tthis one is great, the sugar pours through it nicely, lid is easy to put on and it's secure and the sugar doesn't clump up at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: oftenpuzzled

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great, keeps ants out. Pours easy and hasn't gotten clogged.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good little container!
customer_reviews.text: Great little container that we use to keep our cinnamon/sugar mixture on hand.
customer_reviews.author: PraiseGod13

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this item. It's just what I needed. Clean appearance. Easy handling.
customer_reviews.author: C Valle

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Gets Clogged in Top
customer_reviews.text: The sugar gets clogged in the opening and doesn’t pour out. After cleaning out the top several times to unclog it, I now have simply resorted to removing the top and spooning out the sugar. So, in my opinion, it’s not very effective as a “dispenser.”
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Dispense with the sweets
customer_reviews.text: Dispenser has a lid that when you depress the back, it opens up the poor spout, press to close it. Capacity is similar to similar dispensers you see in restaurants. It is nicer than the metal lids that flap open and closed and stick all the time. I plan to try it with sugar substitutes like Pyure or Splenda but I haven't put it to use yet, so I don't know how well those light static challenged sugars will do. I'll try to remember to update you once I do try it.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Would love to leave a credible review, but this was delivered in 50 pieces, so I guess I should send it back to Amazon that way...lol
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Wife bought this
customer_reviews.text: The Best sugar dispense I ever seen and used.I will recomend to Friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: tina b.

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: purchased for creamer and sugar dispensers and just do not pour with any volume and better to just take top off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Owen

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It's sugar, it collects moisture. Give it a tap or put a cracker in it.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Good size,easy open but the sugar tends to collect on the spout making it hard to close but no big deal
customer_reviews.author: Heidi A.

product_meta.title: Good Cook Glass Sugar Dispenser, 12 oz, Clear
product_meta.description: Size:12 oz| Style Name:Sugar DispenserYour coffee mug just got a new best friend. GoodCook's 12 ounce sugar pourer is sure to sweeten up any cup-of-joe. The screw on lid features a smooth snap cap, ideal for easy storage and dispensing. The smooth finish on the glass helps keep your sugar tasting fresher, longer. With a wide mouth pour spout, when opened, you will be able to get as much or as little sugar as you want. Once empty, clean-up is easy as putting it in the dishwasher.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,334 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
